com.se.simplicity.vector
Interface Vectorf

All Known Subinterfaces:
RGBColourVectorf, TranslationVectorf
All Known Implementing Classes:
SimpleRGBColourVectorf4, SimpleTranslationVectorf4, SimpleVectorf4
public interface Vectorf

A vector that stores its data in a float array.

Author:
Gary Buyn

Method Detail

add

void add(Vectorf vector)

Adds the Vectorf given to this Vectorf.

This Vectorf becomes the result of the addition.

This method assumes both Vectorfs to be homogenised.

Parameters:
vector - The Vectorf to add this Vectorf to.

addCopy

Vectorf addCopy(Vectorf vector)

Adds the Vectorf given to this Vectorf.

A new Vectorf is created as the result of the addition.

This method assumes both Vectorfs to be homogenised.

Parameters:
vector - The Vectorf to add this Vectorf to.
Returns:
A new Vectorf that is the result of sum of this Vectorf and the Vectorf given.

crossProductRight

void crossProductRight(Vectorf vector)

Performs a cross product of this Vectorf and the Vectorf given. The Vectorf given is placed on the right hand side of the equation.

This Vectorf becomes the result of the cross product.

This method assumes both Vectorfs to be homogenised.

Parameters:
vector - The Vectorf to be placed on the right hand side of the equation.

crossProductRightCopy

Vectorf crossProductRightCopy(Vectorf vector)

Performs a cross product of this Vectorf and the Vectorf given. The Vectorf given is placed on the right hand side of the equation.

A new Vectorf is created as the result of the cross product.

This method assumes both Vectorfs to be homogenised.

Parameters:
vector - The Vectorf to be placed on the right hand side of the equation.
Returns:
A new Vectorf that is the result of the cross product of this Vectorf and the Vectorf given.

dotProduct

float dotProduct(Vectorf vector)

Performs a dot product of this Vectorf and the Vectorf given

This method assumes both Vectorfs to be homogenised.

Parameters:
vector - The Vectorf to perform the dot product with.
Returns:
The dot product of this Vectorf and the Vectorf given.

getLength

float getLength()

Retrieves the length of this Vectorf.

Returns:
The length of this Vectorf.

getLengthSquared

float getLengthSquared()

Retrieves the length of this Vectorf squared.

Returns:
The length of this Vectorf squared.

homogenize

void homogenize()

Homogenises this Vectorf.

Scales all values equally so that the w value of this Vectorf is 1.0f.

multiplyLeft

void multiplyLeft(Matrixf matrix)

Multiplies this Vectorf with the Matrixf given. This Vectorf is treated as a column vector and multiplied as follows: 

 ----------------     -----
  x | x | x | x |  *  | x |
 ----------------     -----
  x | x | x | x |     | x |
 ----------------     -----
  x | x | x | x |     | x |
 ----------------     -----
  x | x | x | x |     | x |
 ----------------     -----

This Vectorf becomes the result of the multiplication.

Parameters:
matrix - The Matrixf to be placed on the left hand side of the equation.

multiplyLeftCopy

Vectorf multiplyLeftCopy(Matrixf matrix)

Multiplies this Vectorf with the Matrixf given. This Vectorf is treated as a column vector and multiplied as follows: 

 ----------------     -----
  x | x | x | x |  *  | x |
 ----------------     -----
  x | x | x | x |     | x |
 ----------------     -----
  x | x | x | x |     | x |
 ----------------     -----
  x | x | x | x |     | x |
 ----------------     -----

A new Vectorf is created as the result of the multiplication.

Parameters:
matrix - The Matrixf to be placed on the left hand side of the equation.
Returns:
A new Vectorf that is the result of the multiplication of this Vectorf and the Matrixf given.

multiplyRight

void multiplyRight(Matrixf matrix)

Multiplies this Vectorf with the Matrixf given. This Vectorf is treated as a row vector and multiplied as follows: 

 -----------------     -----------------
 | x | x | x | x |  *  | x | x | x | x |
 -----------------     -----------------
                       | x | x | x | x |
                       -----------------
                       | x | x | x | x |
                       -----------------
                       | x | x | x | x |
                       -----------------

This Vectorf becomes the result of the multiplication.

Parameters:
matrix - The Matrixf to be placed on the right hand side of the equation.

multiplyRight

void multiplyRight(Vectorf vector)

Multiplies this Vectorf with the Vectorf given. The Vectorf given is placed on the right hand side of the equation.

This Vectorf becomes the result of the multiplication.

Parameters:
vector - The Vectorf to be placed on the right hand side of the equation.

multiplyRightCopy

Vectorf multiplyRightCopy(Matrixf matrix)

Multiplies this Vectorf with the Matrixf given. This Vectorf is treated as a row vector and multiplied as follows: 

 -----------------     -----------------
 | x | x | x | x |  *  | x | x | x | x |
 -----------------     -----------------
                       | x | x | x | x |
                       -----------------
                       | x | x | x | x |
                       -----------------
                       | x | x | x | x |
                       -----------------

A new Vectorf is created as the result of the multiplication.

Parameters:
matrix - The Matrixf to be placed on the right hand side of the equation.
Returns:
A new Vectorf that is the result of the multiplication of this Vectorf and the Matrixf given.

multiplyRightCopy

Vectorf multiplyRightCopy(Vectorf vector)

Multiplies this Vectorf with the Vectorf given. The Vectorf given is placed on the right hand side of the equation.

A new Vectorf is created as the result of the multiplication.

Parameters:
vector - The Vectorf to be placed on the right hand side of the equation.
Returns:
A new Vectorf that is the result of the multiplication of this Vectorf and the Vectorf given.

negate

void negate()

Negates this Vectorf.

normalize

void normalize()

Scales this Vectorf to a unit length vector.

scale

void scale(float scalar)

Scales this Vectorf by the scalar given.

Parameters:
scalar - The factor to scale this Vectorf by.

subtractRight

void subtractRight(Vectorf vector)

Subtracts the Vectorf given from this Vectorf. The Vectorf given is placed on the right hand side of the equation.

This Vectorf becomes the result of the subtraction.

Parameters:
vector - The Vectorf to be placed on the right hand side of the equation.

subtractRightCopy

Vectorf subtractRightCopy(Vectorf vector)

Subtracts the Vectorf given from this Vectorf. The Vectorf given is placed on the right hand side of the equation.

A new Vectorf is created as the result of the subtraction.

Parameters:
vector - The Vectorf to be placed on the right hand side of the equation.
Returns:
A new Vectorf that is the result of the subtraction of the Vectorf given from this Vectorf.
